content: this pattern is designed to be a relaxed fun and addictive quick knit let your imagination run riot play with colour and texture use up stash yarns or work entirely in one colour - your options are limitless **needles** 6 mm & 7mm needles 60-80 cm cable if using circular needles **yarn** use dk 10ply or 12ply yarn *samples worked in fete & albertine by skeinz* s1 120 cm 7 main colour and 2 balls of 2 contrasts s2 140 cm 8 main colour and 2 balls of 2 contrasts s3 160 cm 9 main colour and 2 balls of 2 contrasts total meterage of yarn if doing in one colour s1 120 cm 11 x 50 gm balls total meterage 1140m s2 140 cm 12 x 50 gm balls total meterage 1240m s3 160 cm 13 x 50 gm balls total meterage 1350m
